content: You can encounter this miniboss while exploring the large area partway through the Bamboo Grove in Snake Trail. From the Shrine, you can either head up and over the bridge, or jump through a grove of bamboo left of the shrine to reach a stream.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang.md', within the main section titled 'Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang'.
The content is as follows:
You can encounter this miniboss while exploring the large area partway through the Bamboo Grove in Snake Trail. From the Shrine, you can either head up and over the bridge, or jump through a grove of bamboo left of the shrine to reach a stream.
